definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Lipoic Acid is a powerful anti-oxidant and helps protect the brain.
sentences.chinese: 硫辛酸是一种强有力的抗氧化剂有助于保护大脑。

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 采用浸渍吸附法对纳米晶二氧化钛薄膜进行染料敏化。

sentences.english: The factors were studied which affected the preparation of PFS in this method.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯酸钠氧化法制备PFS的影响因素。

sentences.english: Preferably the starting material is dissolved in methanol and a stoichiometric excess of ammonium hydroxide is added.
sentences.chinese: 原料最好溶解于甲醇并加入过量氢氧化铵。

sentences.english: Many people overestimate the benefits of vitamin C and other antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 许多人高估了维C和其它抗氧化剂的好处。

sentences.english: The samples of tungsten carbide were prepared from the blue tungsten trioxide and the ammonium paratungstate Separately.
sentences.chinese: 用蓝色氧化钨和仲钨酸铵分别制取碳化钨。

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 当食用油冷却时，先将甲醇和氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: For an extra dose of antioxidants, have a glass of red wine on the side.
sentences.chinese: 为了一个额外分量的抗氧化剂，另外再加一杯红酒。

sentences.english: Catechin is a phenol antioxidant found in grape seeds.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄籽中含有的儿茶素是一种酚类抗氧化剂。

sentences.english: Buy vehicles with low NOX emissions, and maintain all vehicles well.
sentences.chinese: 购买少产生氮氧化物的汽车，保持汽车的良好状态。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the effect of altitude on lipid peroxidation and anti-oxidation system.
sentences.chinese: 探讨海拔高度对机体脂质过氧化与抗氧化系统的影响。

sentences.english: Objective In order to study the effect of altitude on lipid peroxidation and anti-oxidation system.
sentences.chinese: 探讨海拔高度对机体脂质过氧化与抗氧化系统的影响。

sentences.english: A typical example is the oxidation of ethylbenzene to prepare acetophenone.
sentences.chinese: 其中最有代表性的是乙苯氧化制苯乙酮。

sentences.english: Once in the water, it reacts to form carbonic acid.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳一旦进入水中，就会发生反应形成碳酸。

sentences.english: They nix the idea upon learning that DHMO is actually water.
sentences.chinese: 在知道一氧化二氢其实是水以后他们放弃了这种想法。

sentences.english: Cement clinker of green colour can be obtained by using chromium oxide am a colorant.
sentences.chinese: 以氧化铬作为着色剂，可以烧成绿色水泥熟料。

definition: (milk) to turn sour/(meat, fish) to go off
